member.name: T:Qlik.Sense.JsonRpc.ISession
member.summary: Contains Information to attach to a specific qlik engine session When connecting to a Qlik Sense app you can work with sessions. Sessions specify who should see changes in an app, and are based on combining userId and session key.

member.summary: Application path

member.summary: Interface used for managing web socket connections to Qlik Sense.

member.summary: True if websocket connection is open

member.name: M:Qlik.Sense.JsonRpc.IWebSocketSessionContainer.OpenAsync(System.Action{System.String},System.Action{System.Exception},System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Open a connection to a Qlik Sense instance based on the current location configuration and the argument session.
member.param: Callback to active when messages are received from Qlik Sense.
Callback to activate when an exception has occured on the web socket connection to Qlik Sense.
The token used to synchronize shutdown events.
member.returns: A task with the completion status of the connect operation as result.

member.name: M:Qlik.Sense.JsonRpc.IWebSocketSessionContainer.Close
member.summary: Close an open connection to a Qlik Sense instance. Operation has no effect if the connection is not open.

member.name: M:Qlik.Sense.JsonRpc.IWebSocketSessionContainer.SendMessage(System.String,System.Action{System.Exception})
member.summary: Send a message to a Qlik Sense instance.
member.param: The message to send.

Callback when an error occurs during the send operation. Note that this callback is activated only if the send operation it self triggers an error. Errors returned by Qlik Sense as part of a response to a message should be captured by the onMessage callback provided as argument to .
member.exception: Thrown if connection is not open.

member.summary: The Qlik Sense location object.

member.summary: The Uri of the Qlik Sense server

member.summary: The session specification.

member.summary: Construct a new RpcConnection based on a Qlik Sense location object and a session specification.

The session.

member.summary: Sends a request asynchronously to a Qlik Sense instance
member.param: Request to send

Response handler that is used to change the object into an instance of T.
member.typeparam: Dynamic type that should be returned

member.name: P:Qlik.Sense.JsonRpc.RpcConnection.InboundSerializer
member.summary: The JsonSerializer used for deserializing incoming RPC messages.

member.name: M:Qlik.Sense.JsonRpc.RpcConnection.MakeInboundSerializer
member.summary: Method for creating the JsonSerializer used to deserialize message received from the RPC connection. The method is called the first time the property is accessed, which is typically when the method is called.

member.name: P:Qlik.Sense.JsonRpc.RpcConnection.OutboundSerializer
member.summary: The JsonSerializer used for deserializing outgoing RPC messages.

member.name: M:Qlik.Sense.JsonRpc.RpcConnection.MakeOutboundSerializer
member.summary: Method for creating the JsonSerializer used to serialize requests to an the RPC connection. The method is called the first time the property is accessed, which is typically when the method is called.

member.name: P:Qlik.Sense.JsonRpc.RpcConnection.CancellationToken
member.summary: The token used to synchronize shutdown events with all outstanding tasks

member.name: T:Qlik.Sense.JsonRpc.RpcConnection.PerformanceType
member.summary: Performance log entry types

member.name: M:Qlik.Sense.JsonRpc.RpcConnection.Log(System.String)
member.summary: Method to use when emitting a log message.
member.param: The message to print.

member.name: P:Qlik.Sense.JsonRpc.RpcConnection.Timeout
member.summary: Timeout value (in milliseconds) used for synchronous calls to engine. Usually used together with .

member.name: P:Qlik.Sense.JsonRpc.RpcConnection.RetryCountLimit
member.summary: Maximum number of connection retry attempts performed when opening a websocket connection.

member.name: M:Qlik.Sense.JsonRpc.RpcConnection.OpenAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Open a websocket connection to a Qlik Sense instance based on the location and session associated with the RpcConnection instance.
member.exception: Thrown if the establishing of a connection takes more time than the current timeout setting as defined in the property .

member.name: E:Qlik.Sense.JsonRpc.RpcConnection.ConnectionClosingEvent
member.summary: Event that fires when a connection closes.

member.name: M:Qlik.Sense.JsonRpc.RpcConnection.EnsureConnectionIsOpen
member.returns: Returns true if connection was opened and false if connection was already open.

member.name: E:Qlik.Sense.JsonRpc.RpcConnection.PushMessageEvent
member.summary: Will catch all responses without registered receiver

member.name: T:Qlik.Sense.JsonRpc.RpcConnection.ClientNotificationSeverity
member.summary: notice - FYI type, example session will be closed in X seconds. warning - Something has gone wrong, but session can continue. Example: object you tried to modify is deleted. fatal - Serious error, page must be reloaded. Example session dies NOW, app doesn't exist etc.

member.name: E:Qlik.Sense.JsonRpc.RpcConnection.ResponseEvent
member.summary: Event that is fired when a response is received on the web socket.

member.name: E:Qlik.Sense.JsonRpc.RpcConnection.CommunicationErrorEvent
member.summary: Event that fires when an exception occurs on the web socket.

member.summary: Deserialize a token to a specific type.
member.param: The Json token to deserialize.
member.returns: The token deserialized as a an object of type T.

member.name: M:Qlik.Sense.JsonRpc.RpcConnection.Dispose
member.summary: Performs application-defined tasks associated with freeing, releasing, or resetting unmanaged resources.

member.name: T:Qlik.Sense.JsonRpc.Session
member.summary: Contains Information to attach to a specific Qlik engine session When connecting to a Qlik Sense app you can work with sessions. Sessions specify who should see changes in an app, and are based on combining userId and session key.
member.remarks: Only one app can be open in a session at a time

member.name: P:Qlik.Sense.JsonRpc.Session.Default
member.summary: Default session usable for connecting to the hub

member.name: P:Qlik.Sense.JsonRpc.Session.Random
member.summary: Initializes a globally unique session.
member.remarks: Only available when not accessing Qlik engine through a proxy

member.name: P:Qlik.Sense.JsonRpc.Session.ApplicationPath
member.summary: Application path

member.name: P:Qlik.Sense.JsonRpc.Session.SessionToken
member.summary: Session token

member.name: T:Qlik.Sense.JsonRpc.WebSocketSessionContainer
member.summary: Class responsible for managing web socket connections to Qlik Sense.

member.name: P:Qlik.Sense.JsonRpc.WebSocketSessionContainer.IsConnected
member.summary: True if websocket connection is open

member.name: M:Qlik.Sense.JsonRpc.WebSocketSessionContainer.OpenAsync(System.Action{System.String},System.Action{System.Exception},System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Open a connection to a Qlik Sense instance based on the current location configuration and the argument session.
member.param: Callback to active when messages are received from Qlik Sense.
Callback to activate when an exception has occurred on the web socket connection to Qlik Sense.
The token used to synchronize shutdown events.
member.returns: A task with the completion status of the connect operation as result.

member.name: M:Qlik.Sense.JsonRpc.WebSocketSessionContainer.SendMessage(System.String,System.Action{System.Exception})
member.summary: Send a message to a Qlik Sense instance.
member.param: The message to send.

Callback when an error occurs during the send operation. Note that this callback is activated only if the send operation it self triggers an error. Errors returned by Qlik Sense as part of a response to a message should be captured by the onMessage callback provided as argument to .
member.exception: Thrown if connection is not open.

member.name: P:Qlik.Sense.JsonRpc.WebSocketSessionContainer.SessionSpecificWebsocketParameters
member.summary: Websocket parameters associated with a specific session.

member.name: M:Qlik.Sense.JsonRpc.WebSocketSessionContainer.Close
member.summary: Close an open connection to a Qlik Sense instance. Operation has no effect if the connection is not open.
